	1 . &lsquo;Knights&rsquo; brings to mind a sense of brotherhood / loyalty / bravery / courage / a purpose and mission in battle, in contrast to them being &lsquo;lost/Third World/less than&rsquo; individuals (1) 
	
		 
	
		2 . and &lsquo;Royal&rsquo; invokes highly privileged/nobility/majestic/princely notion/quality, in contrast to the facts that they were merely ghetto kids / Third World less than people. (1)
